rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.condition: Initial contact with patient or when identity is unclear.
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient with us, or have you visited before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.condition: Patient provides their new or established status.
rules.action: Confirm understanding of the patient's status.
rules.example: Okay, so you're a new patient with us.

rules.title: Inquire Reason for Visit
rules.action: Ask about the primary reason for the appointment.
rules.example: And what can we help you with today?

rules.title: Acknowledge Health Concerns
rules.condition: Patient describes their health concerns or reason for visit.
rules.action: Show empathy and confirm understanding of the patient's needs.
rules.example: I understand you're experiencing some discomfort.

rules.title: Information Gathering Protocol
rules.condition: During the initial phase of the call.
rules.action: Systematically gather patient status, insurance details, and reason for visit before discussing appointment logistics.
rules.example: Before we look at appointment times, could you tell me a bit about your dental insurance?

rules.title: Inquire About New Patient Insurance
rules.action: Ask if the new patient has dental insurance.

rules.title: Gather Insurance Details
rules.condition: New patient confirms having dental insurance.
rules.action: Request insurer's name and plan type.
rules.example: Great, could you please tell me your insurance company's name and plan type, for example, PPO or HMO?

rules.title: Verify In-Network Status
rules.action: Check if the office is in-network and inform the patient of the status.
rules.example: Let me quickly check if we're in-network with [Insurance Company]. One moment please. Yes, we are in-network with them.

rules.title: Clarify Insurance Information
rules.condition: Patient requests clarification on insurance details.
rules.action: Provide requested details or explain relevant policy aspects.
rules.example: Certainly, what part of your insurance plan would you like me to clarify?

rules.title: Request Appointment Preferences
rules.condition: After gathering necessary patient and insurance information.
rules.action: Ask for preferred days and times for an appointment.
rules.example: What days and times work best for your appointment?

rules.title: Check and Offer Availability
rules.action: Check the schedule and offer available slots.
rules.example: Let me see... We have an opening on Tuesday at 10 AM, or Wednesday at 2 PM. Do either of those work for you?

rules.title: Confirm Booking Intent
rules.condition: After the patient has selected a preferred appointment slot from the available options.
rules.action: Explicitly state the intent to book the chosen appointment immediately, before requesting any further details for finalization.
rules.example: Great, I'll go ahead and book that appointment for you now.
